h2_title: Pale-Axe Stalwart Boss Fight and Guide
img_above_text:
# Pale-Axe Stalwart
The Pale-Axe Stalwart is a Character boss you'll go up against at the start of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. After defeating the imposing Stalwart, you'll be asked to complete a side quest for him.
## Pale-Axe Stalwart Boss Fight and Guide

The health bar for the Pale-Axe Stalwart will appear as soon as you approach the open area. There will be Revenants and Bull Soldiers fighting around you, but you can ignore these and focus solely on the Pale-Axe Stalwart for this miniboss fight.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," specifically from the boss fight against the Pale-Axe Stalwart in Chapter 5. The setting is a desolate, battle-ravaged area with dark, eerie surroundings. The Pale-Axe Stalwart, a large and imposing character, is engaged in combat with the player character. Other enemies, such as Revenants and Bull Soldiers, are present in the background but are not the primary focus of the fight. The image serves to illustrate the intense and challenging nature of this miniboss encounter.
